companies.name: Zenith Bank
companies.address: Zenith Heights, Plot 83, Ajose Adeogun street, Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria
companies.about: Zenith Bank is a Nigerian multinational financial services provider that has since grown to become one of the largest and most profitable banks in Nigeria.

companies.name: Devnode Technologies
companies.address: 813 Rev. Emmanuel Adubifa St, omole phase 2, Lagos 100001, Lagos
companies.about: Devnode designs and build intelligent, premium, and intuitive web applications, cloud systems, desktop applications, and mobile apps that help start-ups and existing businesses alike streamline processes and generate new revenue streams.

companies.name: Dangote Cement
companies.address: Union Marble House 1 Alfred Rewane Road, PMB 40032, Falomo Ikoyi, Lagos, NIGERIA
companies.about: Dangote Cement is a multinational corporation based in Nigeria and is the largest cement producer in Africa.

companies.name: Elbe Pharma
companies.about: Elbe Pharma Nigeria Limited is a pharmaceutical company based in Nigeria.

companies.name: The Place Restaurants
companies.address: Plot 38 Block a10 Admiralty Way Lekki Phase 1
companies.about: The Place is a popular restaurant chain in Nigeria known for its diverse menu and casual dining atmosphere.

companies.name: King's College
companies.address: 3, Catholic Mission Street, Tafawa Balewa Square, Lagos
companies.about: King's College Lagos is a prestigious secondary school located in Lagos, founded in 1909 by the British colonial administration. It is one of the oldest and most renowned educational institutions in Nigeria.

companies.name: Air Peace
companies.address: 25, Sobo Arobiodu Street GRA, Ikeja, Lagos
companies.about: Air Peace is a Nigerian airline based in Lagos known for its relatively large fleet size and a wide network covering major cities within Nigeria and abroad.

companies.name: Reddington Hospital
companies.about: Reddington Hospital is a leading healthcare facility located in Lagos, Nigeria. It is renowned for its high-quality medical services and state-of-the-art facilities.
